subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Doping (Sports)
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: After a long, deliberate absence from the Tour, LeMond, a three-time winner, has quickly become the face of cycling on Eurosport, which broadcasts the event live.
snippet: After a long, deliberate absence from the Tour, LeMond, a three-time winner, has quickly become the face of cycling on Eurosport, which broadcasts the event live.
